00017 // EARS
00018 #include "Stat.hpp"
00019 #include "Logger.hpp"

00021 
00023 void 
00024 ears::Stat::incOpCount( const std::string& operation )
00025 {
00026   this->incOpCount( operation, 1 );
00027 }  
00028 
00029 
00030 
00032 void 
00033 ears::Stat::incOpCount( const std::string& operation, const int& count )
00034 {
00035   std::map< std::string, int >::iterator it = opCount_.find( operation );
00036   if ( it != opCount_.end() ) 
00037     opCount_[operation] += count;
00038   else
00039     opCount_[operation] = count;
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 
00045 void 
00046 ears::Stat::outputStat()
00047 {  
00048   // we get the length of the longest operation name, for fancy displaying
00049   int maxlength = 0;
00050   std::map< std::string, int >::iterator it;
00051   for ( it = opCount_.begin(); it != opCount_.end(); it++ ) 
00052     if ( ((std::string) it->first).length() > maxlength )
00053       maxlength = ((std::string) it->first).length();
00054   
00055   std::string spaces = "";
00056   std::string sep = "----------";
00057   for ( int i = 0; i < maxlength; i++ ) {
00058     spaces += " ";
00059     sep += "-";
00060   }
00061   
00062   
00063   LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Statistics:" << std::endl
00064     << "    Operation" << spaces.substr( 0, maxlength - 9 ) 
00065     << "    Count " << std::endl 
00066     << "    " << sep;
00067 
00068   for ( it = opCount_.begin(); it != opCount_.end(); it++ ) {
00069     LOG( logDEBUG ) << "  " << it->first 
00070       << spaces.substr( 0, maxlength - ((std::string) it->first).length() ) 
00071       << "    " << it->second;
00072   }
00073   
00074   LOG( logDEBUG) << "  " << sep; 
00075 }
